label: Walters MS 688
description:
This manuscript illustration of a group
                    of youths before a king and his courtiers was executed in Iran during the early
                    eleventh century AH / seventeenth CE. Stylistically it relates to manuscript
                    production in Shiraz in the tenth century AH / sixteenth CE and early eleventh
                    century AH / seventeenth CE. The painting is framed by illuminated borders in
                    tones of gold. The back of the leaf has additional illumination and no
                    text. For full description, see http://www.thedigitalwalters.org/Data/WaltersManuscripts/html/W688/description.html
